text: Mockup and redesign of restaurant website. Tool: Figma
caseChallenge: Redesign the restaurant website to make it modern, accessible, and visually appealing. Provide a better user experience to find all informastion a customer needs. Envoke emotion so users desire to make reservations.
caseSolution: Here I created a style guide and component guide. When working on this redesign I wanted to ensure I captured the essense of the restaurant. I restructured the different pages to provide a better experience when a user needs to find specific information. I added the sticky buttons for reservations and online ordering to be available and accessible at all times.

text: Display mockups for online business and marketing
caseChallenge: Prototype for online product shop to show phone and ipad wallpapers for sale
caseSolution: These designs are clean and simple and show how the wallpaper will look on each device.

text: Product display mockups for online business and marketing.
caseChallenge: Design for online product shop to show stickers on different layouts for sale
caseSolution: The designs are shown on different backgrounds while looking clean and visually pleasing.
